13896.「大丈夫。すぐに よくなる。\n さあ 眠りなさい アルノー。:
Don't worry. Everything will be all right. Go
back to sleep, Arnoud.

13898.「あの子は…… アルノーは 私の息子なのだ。: That boy, Arnoud... is my son.

13899.「……<pc>。\n 私が 恐れていた日が 来てしまった。:
...<pc>. The day I had feared has
finally come.

13900.「これは ただの はやり病ではない。\n 死神の息吹…… ３００年もの昔に\n:
This is no mere illness. It is the Reaper's
Breath... a deadly disease that claimed many
lives 300 years ago.

13901.「冒された者は 身体に 黒いアザが現れ\n やがては 死に至る。このままでは……:
Those affected will develop black bruises on
their bodies, which will eventually lead to
death. If this continues...

13904.「そうでしたか…… やはり はやり病とは\n 死神の息吹のことだったんですね。:
I see... so this outbreak really is the
Reaper's Breath.

13905.「じつは ともしびの木の お礼がしたくて\n いろいろ調べていたら 香術の書に\:
I wanted to thank you for getting the Lamplight wood before, so I did some research and found a reference to the Reaper's Breath
in the Book of Perfumery.

13906.「それによると ３００年前に\n 死神の息吹から 人々を救ったのは\n 閃香樹と:
According to the book, there was a fragrant
tree known as the Senka that saved people from
the Reaper's Breath 300 years ago.

13907.「ですが……私も 長年 香術師をやってますが\n 閃香樹という香木は 聞いたこと:
But... in all my years as a perfumer, I've
never heard of a Senka tree before.

13908.「でも ちょうど 北西のモリナラ大森林に\n エルトナ・レンジャー協会モリナラ支:
To the northwest, in the Molinara Forest,
there is a cabin belonging to the Molinara
Chapter of the Eltona Rangers Association.

13909.「森の木々をよく知る レンジャーたちなら\n 閃香樹のことが わかるかもしれませ:
Rangers who know the trees of the forest may
be able to tell us more about the Senka. Let's
go!

13910.「ここは 世界に 名立たる\n エルトナ・レンジャー協会\n モリナラ支部で ご:
This is the Molinara Chapter of the
world-famous Eltona Rangers Association.

13911.「……なるほど。\n 閃香樹について お知りになりたいと？ \n よろしい。お教:
...I see. You want to know more about the
Senka trees? Very well, I'll tell you.

13912.「閃香樹は 神聖なチカラが宿るといわれ\n 昔から 祭事などに 使われていた木で:
The Senka is a tree that is said to possess
sacred powers, and has been used for rituals
since ancient times.

13913.「それが証拠に あなた方の\n キリカ修道会に伝わる 木彫りの神像も\n 閃香樹:
In fact, the wooden idol of the Kirika Order
is made of the wood from these trees.

13914.「ですが……今から 閃香樹を探しても\n 手には入りませんぞ。なにしろ\n ３０:
But... you won't be finding any Senka trees
now. That's because the tree went extinct 300
years ago.

13915.「なんと……！ <pc>さん。\n 木かげの集落に 戻りましょう。\n 僧正様た:
Oh, no...! Let's return to Treeshade Village,
<pc>. We must tell the other
priests about this.

13916.「おお <pc>と\n 香術師の方では ありませんか。\n いったい おふたりで:
Oh, <pc>, and... the perfumer?
Where have you two been?

13917.「じつは 私と <pc>さんは\n 死神の息吹から 人々を救う方法を\n 探して:
Actually, <pc> and I were looking
for a way to save the people from the Reaper's
Breath.

13918.「そして ３００年前に 死神の息吹が \n 吹き荒れた時 閃香樹という香木による:
And we learned that 300 years ago, when the
Reaper's Breath appeared, incense made from a
Senka tree saved the people of that time.

13919.「ですが……残念ながら その閃香樹は\n すでに 絶滅していました……。:
But unfortunately, the Senka tree has already
gone extinct...

13921.「ふふふ……。\n しかし グッドニュースですよ 皆さん！: Hmhmhm... but I have good news, folks!

13922.「じゃじゃ～ん！ なんと！\n あなた方の ご神像が その閃香樹で\n 作られて:
Ta-da! What a surprise! We discovered that
your idol is made of Senka wood!

13924.「……つまり あのご神像を お香にして焚けば \n みんな 助かるってことですよ:
...In other words, if we burn the idol as
incense, everyone will be saved!

13926.「あの ご神像には まことに\n エルドナ神が 宿っている。\n それを焚くこと:
That idol is the vessel of Eldona. There is no
way we can burn it.

13928.「だが よく調べてくれた。\n その 絶滅した閃香樹とかいうのが\n 他に残って:
But you have done well to research this. I
will see if I can find any more of this
supposedly extinct Senka tree.

13930.「今は これ以上 できることは ありません。\n 死神の息吹のことは 我らにまか:
There is nothing more that can be done for
now. Leave the Reaper's Breath to us, and
continue your training.

13931.「案ずることはない。\n 必ず 閃香樹を見つけだしてみせる。\n あの子を……:
Don't worry. I will find the Senka tree. I
will not let that child... I will not let
Arnoud die.

32314.「はぁはぁ…… どうして？\n なんで みんな 悲しそうな顔するの？:
Ha-ha-ha... Why? Why does everyone look so
sad?

32315.「ボク…どんなに 苦しくてもガマンできるよ。\n お母さんが どんな病気も 治し:
I can endure it no matter how painful it is.
My mother will heal me no matter how sick I
am. So don't worry about me.
